name: Yuri
description: What is the project about? An API-integrated Gaming Eco-protocol Based on ChatGPT, powered by Arbitrum & AIGC. What makes your project unique? YURI AI is an API-integrated gaming eco-protocol that is based on ChatGPT. It allows users to, via the API, log into all ecosystems embedded in the platform with a single click. In addition to the blockchain network and the artificial intelligence technology, it also utilizes the Arbitrum network to establish a YURI AI digital chain gaming ecosystem. YURI AI not only boosts the building of Web3 gaming network and metaverse, but also pushes the combination of the blockchain industry with the AI industry, thus promoting the pan-entertainment game in the metauniverse era. History of your project. YURI AI is launched to advance the combination of the blockchain industry with the AI industry and to accelerate the building of Web3 gaming network through the development of blockchain-based games. Whatâ€™s next for your project? YURI AI has completed the initial stage of system development, as well as the development and adaptation of the NFT generator and the integration of various games. After the development is complete, internal testing will be conducted. At the same time, we will also launch SBT-NFT and DID identity ratings, providing users in the YURI AI ecosystem with more rights and jointly building the community. What can your token be used for?
